      • isOpponent

        public boolean isOpponent(int myRow,
                          int myCol,
                          int oppRow,
                          int oppCol)
        Are two positions occupied by different players?
        Parameters:
        myRow - row location of checkerboard
        myCol - column location of checkerboard
        oppRow - row location of checkerboard
        oppCol - column location of checkerboard
        Returns:
        Returns true if positions occupy different players

                           int fromCol,
                           int toRow,
                           int toCol)
        Checking to see if (fromRow,fromCol) to (toRwo,toCol) is a valid non-jumping move.
        Parameters:
        fromRow - row location of checkerboard
        fromCol - column location of checkerboard
        toRow - row location of checkerboard
        toCol - column location of checkerboard Precondition: Current location is valid
        Returns:
        returns true if it is a valid move

        Parameters:

        toRow - row location of checkerboard
        toCol - column location of checkerboard
        Returns:

      • gameOver

        public boolean gameOver()
        Determines if there is a winner. Count the number of pieces left for each player. If there are not any pieces left for a player, they lose, and the other player is the winner.
        Returns:
        returns true if there is a winner - all of one color's pieces are gone
